scripts.compile:all: npm run compile:lang && npm run compile:forms
scripts.vsix:lang: npm -w packages/pb-lang-support run compile && npm -w packages/pb-lang-support run webpack:prod && cd packages/pb-lang-support && npx @vscode/vsce package --no-dependencies -o ../../pb-lang-support.vsix
scripts.vsix:forms: npm -w packages/pb-forms-editor run compile && cd packages/pb-forms-editor && npx @vscode/vsce package --no-dependencies -o ../../pb-forms-editor.vsix
scripts.vsix:all: npm run vsix:lang && npm run vsix:forms
